snippet: Rich Cohen describes the rise of Samuel Zemurray, the fruit peddler who came to control much of Central America.
abstract: Mark Lewis reviews biography The Fish That Ate the Whale: The Life and Times of America's Banana King by Rich Cohen.
lead_paragraph: Rich Cohen describes the rise of Samuel Zemurray, the fruit peddler who came to control much of Central America.

headline.seo: ‘The Fish That Ate the Whale,’ by Rich Cohen
